attributes.comment:
I would hate to see the USCIS raise fees again for adoptive parents. We recently
adopted from China and due to the unexpected slowdown we had to redo all of our
paperwork and pay double on all the fees. I believe that this is an undue burden
on families who already have numerous fees and expenses related to adoption.
Most families are working hard to provide loving homes for abandoned children and
would appreciate help and not another roadblock in this journey. Please consider
keeping the fees the same at least for the time being until things stabilize in the
adoption community and a decision is made that will keep the paperwork current
for longer. I do not think people would mind a slight increase if they only have to
pay once, not twice or three times as seems to be happening right now.

Thanks for listening,

Glenda Nanna
mom to Kylee from China

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Glenda H. Nanna
